errors.error_description: Uses invalid command syntax with '--target=invalid-target' parameter that doesn't exist in Bob
correction_candidates: Change to 'bob --build' which is the correct basic build command
Replace with 'bob --make --all' for building all targets
Change to 'bob --target all --compile' with correct parameter order
errors.golden_answer: Change to 'bob --build' which is the correct basic build command

correction_candidates: Remove the configuration file reference as it's not needed for documentation
Change to 'Rules.mk' which is the actual Bob configuration file
Replace with '.bob/config.json' for the correct config location
Update to 'src/makefile' which contains build configuration
errors.golden_answer: Change to 'Rules.mk' which is the actual Bob configuration file
